messages.subject: announcement of an insurance incident
messages.content:
Liraz Eliezer Hello, 
 We received the announcement of an insurance incident of the type: medical-medical Nahal
 Your inquiry will be answered within 3 business days and a message will be sent to you via SMS and / or e-mail.
 For further details, please contact the Claims Service call center from 8: 30-16: 00 at * 6564.
 We are available to you with any question or request,
 
 Best regards,
 The Claims System,
 Clal Insurance Company

messages.subject: Adike - we are on our way!
messages.content:
Re-start :) 

 Your package was packaged and delivered to the delivery company.
The selected delivery method is a courier to your home - the package will reach you within 3 business days 
 (Fridays, Saturdays and holidays are not considered business days) -
 It is recommended that you stay available for delivery coordination.

 Order number: 11111 
 Shipping tracking number: 22222 
 The transaction invoice is attached to this email.

messages.subject: Gett -new!
messages.content:
End of the era 'You will pay me I will repay you' 
 
 From today you can book a taxi with friends and not get involved with unnecessary calculations at the end of the trip, 
 but with the click of a button you will make an equal payment among all the passengers 
 
 Share a taxi And pay less! 
 Only in Gett you can book a taxi and share the payment among the passengers in an equal and cost effective way for everyone!

messages.subject: Hi Liraz,
messages.content:
Thank you for your invitation to castro.com. 
 You can check the status of your order by signing in to your personal account. 
 Please send us an email or call 1800-266-066 Sunday - Thursday, 8:00 to 19:00. 
 Your order confirmation is attached below.  
 Thank you again for purchasing this site.
